text: In[1]:= rp = 0, 0, d  2 rm = 0, 0, - d  2 V[r _] := q / Sqrt[(r - rp).(r - rp)] - q / Sqrt[(r - rm).(r - rm)] Out[1]= 0, 0, d 2  Out[2]= 0, 0, - d 2  In[11]:= - ∇{x,y,z} V[{x, y, z}] Out[11]=  q x x2 + y2 + - d 2 + z2 3/2 - q x x2 + y2 +  d 2 + z2 3/2 , q y x2 + y2 + - d 2 + z2 3/2 - q y x2 + y2 +  d 2 + z2 3/2 , q - d 2 + z x2 + y2 + - d 2 + z2 3/2 - q  d 2 + z x2 + y2 +  d 2 + z2 3/2  In[13]:= EfieldCartesian[r _] =  q x x 2 + y 2 + - d 2 + z 2 3/2 - q x x 2 + y 2 +  d 2 + z 2 3/2 , q y x 2 + y 2 + - d 2 + z 2 3/2 - q y x 2 + y 2 +  d 2 + z 2 3/2 , q - d 2 + z x 2 + y 2 + - d 2 + z 2 3/2 - q  d 2 + z x 2 + y 2 +  d 2 + z 2 3/2  Out[13]=  q x x2 + y2 + - d 2 + z2 3/2 - q x x2 + y2 +  d 2 + z2 3/2 , q y x2 + y2 + - d 2 + z2 3/2 - q y x2 + y2 +  d 2 + z2 3/2 , q - d 2 + z x2 + y2 + - d 2 + z2 3/2 - q  d 2 + z x2 + y2 +  d 2 + z2 3/2  In[14]:= EfieldSpherical = CoordinateTransform"Cartesian" → "Spherical", EfieldCartesian[{x, y, z}]  Out[14]=  q x x2 + y2 + - d 2 + z2 3/2 - q x x2 + y2 +  d 2 + z2 3/2 2 + q y x2 + y2 + - d 2 + z2 3/2 - q y x2 + y2 +  d 2 + z2 3/2 2 + q - d 2 + z x2 + y2 + - d 2 + z2 3/2 - q  d 2 + z x2 + y2 +  d 2 + z2 3/2 2 , ArcTan q - d 2 + z x2 + y2 + - d 2 + z2 3/2 - q  d 2 + z x2 + y2 +  d 2 + z2 3/2 , q x x2 + y2 + - d 2 + z2 3/2 - q x x2 + y2 +  d 2 + z2 3/2 2 + q y x2 + y2 + - d 2 + z2 3/2 - q y x2 + y2 +  d 2 + z2 3/2 2 , ArcTan q x x2 + y2 + - d 2 + z2 3/2 - q x x2 + y2 +  d 2 + z2 3/2 , q y x2 + y2 + - d 2 + z2 3/2 - q y x2 + y2 +  d 2 + z2 3/2  In[15]:= EfieldCylindrical = CoordinateTransform"Cartesian" → "Cylindrical", EfieldCartesian[{x, y, z}]  Out[15]=  q x x2 + y2 + - d 2 + z2 3/2 - q x x2 + y2 +  d 2 + z2 3/2 2 + q y x2 + y2 + - d 2 + z2 3/2 - q y x2 + y2 +  d 2 + z2 3/2 2 , ArcTan q x x2 + y2 + - d 2 + z2 3/2 - q x x2 + y2 +  d 2 + z2 3/2 , q y x2 + y2 + - d 2 + z2 3/2 - q y x2 + y2 +  d 2 + z2 3/2 , q - d 2 + z x2 + y2 + - d 2 + z2 3/2 - q  d 2 + z x2 + y2 +  d 2 + z2 3/2  2 class14.nb In[216]:= Clear[x] region = RegionUnionDisk[{0, 0}, 2], Rectangle[{- 2, - 1}, {2, 1}] ufun = NDSolveValue∇{x,y} 2 u[x, y] ⩵ - 1, PeriodicBoundaryConditionux, y, x ⩵ - 2, Functionx , x + 4, 0, DirichletCondition ux, y ⩵ 0, - 2 < x < 2, u, x, y ∈ region; graph = ContourPlotufun[x, y], {x, y} ∈ region, ColorFunction → "TemperatureMap", AspectRatio → Automatic Out[217]= BooleanRegion[# 1 || # 2 &, {Disk[{0, 0}, 2], Rectangle[{- 2, - 1}, {2, 1}]}] Out[219]= -2 -1 0 1 2 -2 -1 0 1 2 Rectangle[{- 1, - 2}, {1, 2}] class14.nb 3
